title: Cloud Operations Intern
description: Led the modernization of CI/CD by migrating 180+ pipelines from Codefresh to GitHub Actions across 200+ repositories. Built reusable workflow templates, automated image promotion and infrastructure provisioning, and improved release reliability through standardized builds, security scanning, and deployment automation. Contributed to Backstage onboarding by configuring service catalog metadata and collaborating with cross-functional teams to streamline DevOps practices.

title: Software Engineer Apprentice
description: Selected for a competitive 18-month apprenticeship blending advanced coursework with hands-on software engineering projects. Built full-stack applications, practiced Agile development, conducted code reviews, and wrote unit tests to ensure production-quality code. Delivered technical presentations, collaborated on system design decisions, and implemented projects in AI/ML, web development, and mobile app development.
